name: Chiroform Lumbar Roll 9,5 cm
descr:
The Chiroform Lumbar Rolls helps avoiding common low back pain. An 
adjustable elastic strap lets users secure the roll to standard chair 
backs and auto seats. The strap also lets users attach and wear the roll
 around the waist. The strap is easily removed when not used. The rolls 
carrying strap and compact size make it easily portable.
